<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Nethys Note: This rune was not reprinted in the remastered Treasure Vault book. _

Shields with a _retaliation_ rune use the impact of weapons to generate blasts of explosive force that counterattack foes.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a melee Strike;  **Effect** You unleash force damage against the creature that made the triggering attack. This attack deals 4d4 force damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
